title: getting a 30 min ban for my client freezing
body: i was joining a cue and it didn't show any champs or anything it just showed a 0 towards the top of the screen so i was waiting for 2 min and it said that i left the game so i thought it was like a 1 time thing so i went to go play a ranked game  and the same thing happened which makes me mad because i can't control it and it made me loose lp which i worked hard for and i am trying to rank up. Is their any way that you can fix it or urban me it has given me a 30 min ban for something that i can't control?

replies.body:
I can't remove your low-priority queue penalty because we're locked out of making any changes to this system, on top of a disconnection negatively impacting everyone in the match regardless of intent. However, we can work to troubleshoot this together. The symptoms of your issue are common of a poor connection to our servers. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions for this, so I strongly recommend going through all the included steps.

Please let me know if this resolved your issue.
it has been fixed thank you very much

dude i feel your pain, just go back to the old client, less frustration. believe me ive had my share of the new client in testing and i tilted hard before i even got into the game, cause i couldn't even change masteries in time
